subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] the spooks like acrylic?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I made an echo box out of polycarbonate sheet (lexan), that was a necro-box, 
dead, nothing, nada, zip. So I stick to wood and metal.


Frank


>From: Ken Thomas <kennnthomas2000@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: evp-itc <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] the spooks like acrylic?
>Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2007 12:10:51 -0700 (PDT)
>
>has anyone else run into this?
>
>   if you take a scrap of clear acrylic and put a tiny scratch in it and 
>illuminate from side, it seems to make them more talkative.  polystyreene 
>has the opposite effect
>
>   polycarbonate seems to be neutral
